mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_STN( NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , RG_SQNO , ST_AUC_NO , ED_AUC_NO , SEL_STS_DSC , DEL_YN , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO , DDL_QCN ) SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , #{cpy_auc_dt} , RG_SQNO , ST_AUC_NO , ED_AUC_NO , '11' SEL_STS_DSC , DEL_YN , SYSDATE , 'TEST0000' , SYSDATE , 'TEST0000' , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') DDL_QCN FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_STN WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{ori_auc_dt}

INSERT INTO TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_QCN( NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , AUC_DT , QCN , BASE_LMT_AM , CUT_AM , SGNO_PRC_DSC , DDL_YN , TMS_YN , DEL_YN , MALE_KG , FEMALE_KG , TT_SCR , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO , AUC_DSC , AUC_INFMSG , COMMIT_YN ) SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , #{cpy_auc_dt} , QCN +1 , BASE_LMT_AM , CUT_AM , SGNO_PRC_DSC , DDL_YN , TMS_YN , DEL_YN , MALE_KG , FEMALE_KG , TT_SCR , SYSDATE , 'TEST0000' , SYSDATE , 'TEST0000' , AUC_DSC , AUC_INFMSG , COMMIT_YN FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_QCN WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{ori_auc_dt}

RE_PRODUCT_4_1 , EPD_YN , RE_PRODUCT_11 , RE_PRODUCT_11_1 , RE_PRODUCT_12 , RE_PRODUCT_12_1 , RE_PRODUCT_13 , RE_PRODUCT_13_1 , RE_PRODUCT_14 , RE_PRODUCT_14_1 , SPAY_YN , CASE_COW , FSRG_DTM , FSRGMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_CMENO , FED_SPY_YN , AMNNO , MODL_NO , BRCL_ISP_RZT_C , BDLN_VAL , BDHT_VAL , VACN_ORDER , BOVINE_RSLTNM , DNA_SAMPLED_YN ) SELECT NA_BZPLC , AUC_OBJ_DSC , #{cpy_auc_dt} , OSLP_NO , LED_SQNO , FHS_ID_NO , FARM_AMNNO , SOG_NA_TRPL_C , VHC_SHRT_C , RC_DT , '' , '' , SRA_INDV_AMNNO , SRA_SRS_DSC , COW_SOG_WT , FIR_LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM , '0' SRA_SBID_AM , '0' SRA_SBID_UPR , '11' SEL_STS_DSC , BRCL_ISP_CTFW_SMT_YN , BRCL_ISP_DT , LWPR_CHG_NT , VACN_DT , LVST_MKT_TRPL_AMNNO , MT12_OVR_YN , PPGCOW_FEE_DSC , PRNY_JUG_YN , PRNY_YN , NCSS_JUG_YN , NCSS_YN , TRPCS_PY_YN , SRA_TRPCS , SRA_PYIVA , SRA_FED_SPY_AM , TD_RC_CST , MT12_OVR_FEE , AFISM_MOD_DT , PRNY_MTCN , AFISM_MOD_CTFW_SMT_YN , RMHN_YN , SRA_PDMNM , SRA_PD_RGNNM , RMK_CNTN , AUC_PRG_SQ , TMS_YN , DEL_YN , AUC_YN , MOD_KPN_NO , '' DDL_QCN , SOGMN_C , FEE_CHK_YN , SELFEE_CHK_YN , FEE_CHK_YN_FEE , SELFEE_CHK_YN_FEE , BLOOD_AM , DNA_YN , BRANDNM , PDA_ID , DNA_YN_CHK , BOVINE_DT , RE_PRODUCT_1 , mapper.update: UPDATE TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW SET TRMN_AMNNO = '' , AMNNO = '' , LVST_AUC_PTC_MN_NO = '' , SEL_STS_DSC = '11' , SRA_SBID_AM = 0 , SRA_SBID_UPR = 0 , DDL_QCN = '' , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_CMENO = 'TEST0000' WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{cpy_auc_dt} AND FSRGMN_ENO = 'TEST0000'
UPDATE TB_LA_IS_MH_AUC_STN SET DDL_QCN = '' , SEL_STS_DSC = '11' , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_CMENO = 'TEST0000' WHERE NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND AUC_DT = #{cpy_auc_dt} AND FSRGMN_ENO = 'TEST0000'
